Interface IUIMenu

All Known Implementing Classes:
UIMenu, UIMenuEdit, UIMenuFavorites, UIMenuFile, UIMenuHelp, UIMenuTools, UIMenuView, UIMenuWindows, UIMenuWorkspaces
public interface IUIMenu

This class is the interface of all Compendium menu classes
